name: Keeping It Real
text: Their specialty pizzas are always affordable and the family loves their pan crust. Our orders are always ready in a timely fashion. And i hear their buffet is good too.

name: Ann McGahey
text:
Dirty! Don't get waited on.
1) This is a seat available for customers to sit on.  2) This is the bar for customers to sit at with the dirty counters and boxes. 3) Food on the glasses and all around container.

name: Bryan Williamson
text: I ordered online and the pizza was ready right when it was supposed to be. The women running the can register were very friendly and double checked my order to make sure it was right. The food was hot and it was very good. The store was clean. One of the best pizza huts I've been to

name: Tabitha Rice
text: If I could give this place a Zero I DEFINITELY would!! They were Out of EVERYTHING!!! Definitely NOT Worth the $75+ , I ended up spending. I came in from out of town for a Week and wanted to take a Very Good Friend of Mine and Her Family …More

name: Dennis Devero
text: Love this place it has some of the best pizza in town and I love there wings to.

name: Brad Portwood
text: Horrible customer service. Will not return to this branch. It’s a shame because I really like Pizza Hut pizza. I went for the first time in a year because our last experiences have been so bad. The order took 35 minutes, no other customers …More

name: fiasco 1985
text: Very good service, food and wait times. Just have to plan when to come due to the location not being the best to exit from depending on the time you come.

name: Randy Rowell
text: worse service I have ever experienced. Not just 1 time, but many times in 2017. I love the pizza hut food, so I keep thinking the manager will wake up and fix things. But, Friday 5-19-2017 was their last chance. We sat in a booth for 30 …More

text: Love getting wings from here but usually have to wait for my pick up, last time the computer was down. When I have gotten delivery they have forgotten my extra sauces a few times. Other than that they are good.

name: K Nel
text: No customers in when my daughter & I go to dine in. Tables dirty & the server say what would y'all like to drink, of course I say sweet tea. Then she say oh we are out of tea. I'm looking like what & ask how you be pizza hut & out of tea? …More

name: Jeremiah Heikkila
text: I didnt eat here but there were enough negative reviews that I decided to pass. I'm staying in a nearby hotel and I've walked by a few times. The appearance of the outside leads me to give a lot of credit to the negative comments. Ever hear of the broken window theory?

name: Phillip Harris
text: Food was ok, but greasy which is typical of five meat pizza. Service was mediocre at the least since they only had two people working there. My grandson spilled his drink on the floor and our waitress didn't offer to move us or tell us that …More

text: My family and I haven't ordered from Pizza hut in a long time, so we decided to order tonight. It took almost 40 minutes for an order that was estimated to take 15 minutes. They burned the pizza, and we later discovered that it was burned …More

name: Holly Parker
text: Absolutely poor customer service staff and company. Order and put in my information and process it then it ordered to an old address that is six years ago. Not going to make any more attempt to order from this franchise. I give it F

text: The delivery driver sat my food on the ground.   Secondly, The boxes that contained my food looked like they came off the back of a freight truck.  I ordered a med primo meat and received a med pepperoni and sausage.  The cinnamon sticks I …More

text: Very clean with a extremely hard working professional manager and staff!!

name: Daniel R Simpson
text: It's like they have given up on dine-in completely. May still be fine for delivery or take-out.

name: Ashley Howard
text: We went in pizza hut tonight with a party of seven. We waited for 12 to 15 mins for someone to seat us. We never saw an employee at the front the whole time. No one greeted us or anything! We left!  Pizza hut in Milledgeville is very unprofessional and unorganized! It needs some serious management!

text: Service was great, food was perfect!!! Wish they could move to a new location. The hill is bad for business.

Terrible service. After our order was taken, the server came back 10 mins. later and asked what we ordered. Then she went and put it in.

text: Ehh, this Pizza Hut is ok. It’s convenient, because we go to milledgeville often, but it isn’t my favorite location. They are always extremely slow about getting your order out to you. We went two weekends ago and our silverware was …More

text: Dirty, falling apart, food taste bad compared to other pizza hut locations. Management has changed so much in the past few month's so when I have a problem, which is often, I have to deal with a new person almost every time. Im surprised …More

A total waste of my time!

I didn't want to wait any longer so I just took what they made. They really need more help.
